Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach.api

Interface BachAPI

All Superinterfaces:
BuildMainSpaceAPI, BuildTestSpaceAPI, ComputeProjectAPI, ExternalModuleAPI, JavaFormatterAPI, ToolProviderAPI, WriteLogbookAPI
All Known Implementing Classes:
Bach
public interface BachAPI extends JavaFormatterAPI, ExternalModuleAPI, ComputeProjectAPI, BuildMainSpaceAPI, BuildTestSpaceAPI, ToolProviderAPI, WriteLogbookAPI
Defines the extensible API of the Java Shell Builder by combining overlay API declarations.
